meanings.definition: A limbless, burrowing amphibian resembling a worm or snake.
meanings.sent1: The coecilian slithered through the damp soil.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the coecilian in science class.
meanings.sent3: Why did the coecilian bring a shovel to the party? To dig up some fun!
meanings.sent4: The coecilian moved with the smoothness of a flowing river.
meanings.sent5: The coecilian's unique body shape helps it move effortlessly underground.

meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the coecilian anatomy.
meanings.sent2: She wore a shirt with a coecilian pattern on it.
meanings.sent3: The coecilian-themed party decorations were a hit!
meanings.sent4: His coecilian-like movements in the dance impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The coecilian habitat was carefully recreated in the zoo exhibit.
